text.content:
Lights Out

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] until the end of its next turn.

Bludgeoning

Bicep Wound

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} until healed.

Piercing

Bewildering Display

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Flat-Footed] until the end of its next turn.

Slashing

Roaring Blast

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] until healed.

Bomb or Spell
